code: import React from'react';import StyleSheet from"react-native-web/dist/exports/StyleSheet";import View from"react-native-web/dist/exports/View";import Text from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Text";import{Feather}from'@expo/vector-icons';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var BetStatusBadge=function BetStatusBadge(_ref){var status=_ref.status;var getStatusColor=function getStatusColor(){switch(status){case'ganada':return'#4ADE80';case'perdida':return'#F87171';case'pending':default:return'#FBBF24';}};var getStatusText=function getStatusText(){switch(status){case'ganada':return'Ganada';case'perdida':return'Perdida';case'pending':default:return'Pendiente';}};var getStatusIcon=function getStatusIcon(){switch(status){case'ganada':return'check-circle';case'perdida':return'x-circle';case'pending':default:return'clock';}};return _jsxs(View,{style:[styles.container,{backgroundColor:getStatusColor()+"20"}],children:[_jsx(Feather,{name:getStatusIcon(),size:12,color:getStatusColor(),style:styles.icon}),_jsx(Text,{style:[styles.text,{color:getStatusColor()}],children:getStatusText()})]});};var styles=StyleSheet.create({container:{flexDirection:'row',alignItems:'center',paddingHorizontal:8,paddingVertical:4,borderRadius:12},icon:{marginRight:4},text:{fontSize:12,fontWeight:'500'}});export default BetStatusBadge;
